name: Triple Match 3D: Goods Sort
description:
Triple Match 3D: Goods Sort is a newly designed matching three puzzle game. Fans of mahjong matching games will experience endless excitement and fun with this awesome matching 3d game. Enjoy unique goods sorting gameplay that will keep you busy for hours! Spend hours of fun playing Triple Match 3D puzzle matching game and enjoy awesome levels and fun challenges! Enjoy your brain time, and improve your sorting skills to become a matching master!

Game Features
* Enjoy the fun of goods sorting!

* Beautifully designed match 3d levels

* Realistic 3d goods

* Simple matching gameplay

* Generous props and gold coin rewards

* Easy and relaxing time killer game

* Super boosters and hints to help you pass hard levels

How to play

* Find same items! Tap the same three 3d goods to shopping cart

* Just matching and sorting! 3 of same goods will be cleared

* Enjoy fun match 3d game and great features

* Complete the different missions and win great rewards

* ATTENTION! Each level has a timer, so you must move fast & reach the level goal!

* Use the boosters to help you pass tricky levels

Don't hesitate! Put your logic and strategy skills to the test in this addicting Triple Match 3D game!
